mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_TB ( TITLE , CONTENT , MEMBER_ID) VALUE (#{title} , #{content} , #{member_id})
mapper.select: SELECT board_id, title, content, reg_date, view_cnt, member_id FROM board_tb WHERE board_id = #{board_id}
SELECT BOARD_ID , TITLE , CONTENT , REG_DATE , VIEW_CNT , MEMBER_ID FROM BOARD_TB WHERE board_id > 0 ORDER BY BOARD_ID DESC, REG_DATE DESC
SELECT BOARD_ID , TITLE , CONTENT , MEMBER_ID , REG_DATE , VIEW_CNT FROM BOARD_TB WHERE BOARD_ID > 0 ORDER BY BOARD_ID DESC LIMIT #{page}, 10
SELECT BOARD_ID , TITLE , CONTENT , MEMBER_ID , REG_DATE , VIEW_CNT FROM BOARD_TB WHERE BOARD_ID > 0 ORDER BY BOARD_ID DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
